Action.author: roamerxv
Action.body: The error will display at Centos7.2 ，But not show at Ubuntu。

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: The resolution for me was to add "dns_search: ." to each node in the composition. This is because of how my local router deals with DNS in my setup. YMMV.

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: I should also add: I am working on a tool that is simiiar to e2e in many ways, and have implemented the "dns_search" fix. You can see a working example here: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/8579/4/examples/cluster/docker-compose.yaml

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: e2e_cli works fine for me and looks like ~roamerxv as well so closing this one
